Then<S>116</S> Darius<S>1868</S> the king<S>4430</S> made<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S>, and search<S>1240</S> was made in the house<S>1005</S> of the rolls<S>5609</S>, where<S>8536</S> the treasures<S>1596</S> were laid up<S>5182</S> in Babylon<S>895</S>. <sup>rolls: Chaldee, books</sup> <sup>laid up: Chaldee, made to descend</sup>
And there was found<S>7912</S> at Achmetha<S>307</S>, in the palace<S>1001</S> that is in the province<S>4083</S> of the Medes<S>4076</S>, a<S>2298</S> roll<S>4040</S>, and therein<S>1459</S> was a record<S>1799</S> thus<S>3652</S> written<S>3790</S>: <sup>Achmetha: or, Ecbatana, or, in a coffer</sup>
In the first<S>2298</S> year<S>8140</S> of Cyrus<S>3567</S> the king<S>4430</S> the same Cyrus<S>3567</S> the king<S>4430</S> made<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S> concerning the house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S> at Jerusalem<S>3390</S>, Let the house<S>1005</S> be builded<S>1124</S>, the place<S>870</S> where they offered<S>1684</S> sacrifices<S>1685</S>, and let the foundations<S>787</S> thereof be strongly laid<S>5446</S>; the height<S>7314</S> thereof threescore<S>8361</S> cubits<S>521</S>, and the breadth<S>6613</S> thereof threescore<S>8361</S> cubits<S>521</S>;
With three<S>8532</S> rows<S>5073</S> of great<S>1560</S> stones<S>69</S>, and a row<S>5073</S> of new<S>2323</S> timber<S>636</S>: and let the expenses<S>5313</S> be given<S>3052</S> out of<S>4481</S> the king's<S>4430</S> house<S>1005</S>:
And also<S>638</S> let the golden<S>1722</S> and silver<S>3702</S> vessels<S>3984</S> of the house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S>, which Nebuchadnezzar<S>5020</S> took forth<S>5312</S> out of<S>4481</S> the temple<S>1965</S> which is at Jerusalem<S>3390</S>, and brought<S>2987</S> unto Babylon<S>895</S>, be restored<S>8421</S>, and brought again<S>1946</S> unto the temple<S>1965</S> which is at Jerusalem<S>3390</S>, every one to his place<S>870</S>, and place<S>5182</S> them in the house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S>. <sup>brought again: Chaldee, go</sup>
Now<S>3705</S> therefore, Tatnai<S>8674</S>, governor<S>6347</S> beyond<S>5675</S> the river<S>5103</S>, Shetharboznai<S>8370</S>, and your companions<S>3675</S> the Apharsachites<S>671</S>, which are beyond<S>5675</S> the river<S>5103</S>, be ye<S>1934</S> far<S>7352</S> from<S>4481</S> thence<S>8536</S>: <sup>your: Chaldee, their societies</sup>
Let the work<S>5673</S> of this<S>1791</S> house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S> alone<S>7662</S>; let the governor<S>6347</S> of the Jews<S>3062</S> and the elders<S>7868</S> of the Jews<S>3062</S> build<S>1124</S> this<S>1791</S> house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S> in<S>5922</S> his place<S>870</S>.
Moreover I<S>4481</S> make<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S> what<S>3964</S> ye shall do<S>5648</S> to<S>5974</S> the elders<S>7868</S> of these<S>479</S> Jews<S>3062</S> for the building<S>1124</S> of this<S>1791</S> house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S>: that of the king's<S>4430</S> goods<S>5232</S>, even of<S>1768</S> the tribute<S>4061</S> beyond<S>5675</S> the river<S>5103</S>, forthwith<S>629</S> expenses<S>5313</S> be<S>1934</S> given<S>3052</S> unto these<S>479</S> men<S>1400</S>, that they be not<S>3809</S> hindered<S>989</S>. <sup>I make: Chaldee, by me a decree is made</sup> <sup>hindered: Chaldee, made to cease</sup>
And that which<S>4101</S> they have need of<S>2818</S>, both young<S>1123</S> bullocks<S>8450</S>, and rams<S>1798</S>, and lambs<S>563</S>, for the burnt offerings<S>5928</S> of the God<S>426</S> of heaven<S>8065</S>, wheat<S>2591</S>, salt<S>4416</S>, wine<S>2562</S>, and oil<S>4887</S>, according to the appointment<S>3983</S> of the priests<S>3549</S> which are at Jerusalem<S>3390</S>, let it be<S>1934</S> given<S>3052</S> them day<S>3118</S> by day<S>3118</S> without<S>3809</S> fail<S>7960</S>:
That they may offer<S>1934</S> <S>7127</S> sacrifices of sweet savours<S>5208</S> unto the God<S>426</S> of heaven<S>8065</S>, and pray<S>6739</S> for the life<S>2417</S> of the king<S>4430</S>, and of his sons<S>1123</S>. <sup>of sweet: Chaldee, of rest</sup>
Also<S>4481</S> I have made<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S>, that whosoever<S>3606</S> <S>606</S> shall alter<S>8133</S> this<S>1836</S> word<S>6600</S>, let timber<S>636</S> be pulled down<S>5256</S> from<S>4481</S> his house<S>1005</S>, and being set up<S>2211</S>, let him be hanged<S>4223</S> thereon<S>5922</S>; and let his house<S>1005</S> be made<S>5648</S> a dunghill<S>5122</S> for<S>5922</S> this<S>1836</S>. <sup>let him: Chaldee, let him be destroyed</sup>
And the God<S>426</S> that hath caused his name<S>8036</S> to dwell<S>7932</S> there<S>8536</S> destroy<S>4049</S> all<S>3606</S> kings<S>4430</S> and people<S>5972</S>, that shall put<S>7972</S> to their hand<S>3028</S> to alter<S>8133</S> and to destroy<S>2255</S> this<S>1791</S> house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S> which is at Jerusalem<S>3390</S>. I<S>576</S> Darius<S>1868</S> have made<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S>; let it be done<S>5648</S> with speed<S>629</S>.
Then<S>116</S> Tatnai<S>8674</S>, governor<S>6347</S> on this side<S>5675</S> the river<S>5103</S>, Shetharboznai<S>8370</S>, and their companions<S>3675</S>, according<S>6903</S> to that which Darius<S>1868</S> the king<S>4430</S> had sent<S>7972</S>, so<S>3660</S> they did<S>5648</S> speedily<S>629</S>.
And the elders<S>7868</S> of the Jews<S>3062</S> builded<S>1124</S>, and they prospered<S>6744</S> through the prophesying<S>5017</S> of Haggai<S>2292</S> the prophet<S>5029</S> and Zechariah<S>2148</S> the son<S>1247</S> of Iddo<S>5714</S>. And they builded<S>1124</S>, and finished<S>3635</S> it, according<S>4481</S> to the commandment<S>2941</S> of the God<S>426</S> of Israel<S>3479</S>, and according to the commandment<S>2942</S> of Cyrus<S>3567</S>, and Darius<S>1868</S>, and Artaxerxes<S>783</S> king<S>4430</S> of Persia<S>6540</S>. <sup>commandment: Chaldee, decree</sup>
And this<S>1836</S> house<S>1005</S> was finished<S>3319</S> on<S>5705</S> the third<S>8532</S> day<S>3118</S> of the month<S>3393</S> Adar<S>144</S>, which was<S>1932</S> in the sixth<S>8353</S> year<S>8140</S> of the reign<S>4437</S> of Darius<S>1868</S> the king<S>4430</S>.
And the children<S>1123</S> of Israel<S>3479</S>, the priests<S>3549</S>, and the Levites<S>3879</S>, and the rest<S>7606</S> of the children<S>1123</S> of the captivity<S>1547</S>, kept<S>5648</S> the dedication<S>2597</S> of this<S>1836</S> house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S> with joy<S>2305</S>, <sup>the children of the captivity: Chaldee, the sons of the transportation</sup>
And offered<S>7127</S> at the dedication<S>2597</S> of this<S>1836</S> house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S> an hundred<S>3969</S> bullocks<S>8450</S>, two hundred<S>3969</S> rams<S>1798</S>, four<S>703</S> hundred<S>3969</S> lambs<S>563</S>; and for a sin offering<S>2402</S> <S>2409</S> for<S>5922</S> all<S>3606</S> Israel<S>3479</S>, twelve<S>8648</S> <S>6236</S> he<S>6841</S> goats<S>5796</S>, according to the number<S>4510</S> of the tribes<S>7625</S> of Israel<S>3479</S>.
And they set<S>6966</S> the priests<S>3549</S> in their divisions<S>6392</S>, and the Levites<S>3879</S> in their courses<S>4255</S>, for<S>5922</S> the service<S>5673</S> of God<S>426</S>, which is at Jerusalem<S>3390</S>; as it is written<S>3792</S> in the book<S>5609</S> of Moses<S>4873</S>. <sup>as it is: Chaldee, according to the writing</sup>
And the children<S>1121</S> of the captivity<S>1473</S> kept<S>6213</S> the passover<S>6453</S> upon the fourteenth<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> day of the first<S>7223</S> month<S>2320</S>.
For the priests<S>3548</S> and the Levites<S>3881</S> were purified<S>2891</S> together<S>259</S>, all of them were pure<S>2889</S>, and killed<S>7819</S> the passover<S>6453</S> for all the children<S>1121</S> of the captivity<S>1473</S>, and for their brethren<S>251</S> the priests<S>3548</S>, and for themselves.
And the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, which were come again<S>7725</S> out of captivity<S>1473</S>, and all such as had separated<S>914</S> themselves unto them from the filthiness<S>2932</S> of the heathen<S>1471</S> of the land<S>776</S>, to seek<S>1875</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, did eat<S>398</S>,
And kept<S>6213</S> the feast<S>2282</S> of unleavened bread<S>4682</S> seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S> with joy<S>8057</S>: for the LORD<S>3068</S> had made them joyful<S>8055</S>, and turned<S>5437</S> the heart<S>3820</S> of the king<S>4428</S> of Assyria<S>804</S> unto them, to strengthen<S>2388</S> their hands<S>3027</S> in the work<S>4399</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of God<S>430</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
